data.event: Peru was formed from parts of the towns of Plattsburgh and Willsboro (the latter now in Essex County) in 1792.
Part of Peru was returned to Willsboro in 1799.

data.event: In 1838, part of the town was used to form the towns of Au Sable and Black Brook.
